entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
